title: caramelised walnuts
description: Jaggery is an unrefined, dark, hard sugar sold in blocks. Supermarkets have started to stock it, but it's a softer, more watery version of the real thing. Either will work, but the darker one has a more molasses-like flavour.
ingredients: 100g/3Â½oz jaggery (available in Asian stores and some supermarkets), chopped or pounded into smallish pieces
